title: The 80 goes to Sparta
creator_credit: Bill Davies and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: The different faces of the Greek community in Montreal in 1969, with emphasis on cultural and economic problems encountered by new immigrants. The “80” refers to the bus to “80 Av. du Pare”. Music by The Greek Stars.
creator_credit_for_label: Bill Davies and National Film Board of Canada
